member.name: T:FreieWahl.Mail.IMailProvider
member.summary: Implementations of this interface support sending e-mails to one or more recipients

member.name: M:FreieWahl.Mail.IMailProvider.SendMail(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Sends a mail to one or more recipients. It also supports replacing placeholders in the content with values.
member.param: a list of placeholders and values. All occurences of the placeholder(s) in the content are replaces with the corresponding value(s).
member.returns: the result of the send process (true or false)
